manifest_of_lanes.help_text: Path to a manifest of search terms as specified above

save_metadata.help_text: Save the metadata to the results directory that is returned from IRODS

save_fastqs.help_text: Save the fastq's to the results directory after unpacking from CRAMS

save_method.help_text: Structure of the fastq save directory. 'flat' puts all reads into 1 fastq directory; 'nested' separates them into directories for each lane. options: [flat, nested]

raw_reads_prefix:.help_text: Prefix for unpacked reads i.e. raw_251312_1#195_1.fastq.gz set to '' for no prefix
